creator: nddelima@ca.ibm.com
text:
The parser seems to raise errors for gDay values with a time zone qualifier or 
with the UTC indicator.  See below for a valid schema with simpleTypes derived 
from gDay.

Schema: D3_2_14v10.xsd
======================
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
	targetNamespace="http://www.schemaTest.org/D3_2_14v10"
	xmlns:sv="http://www.schemaTest.org/D3_2_14v10">

<simpleType name="dtmEnumeration">
	<restriction  base="gDay">
		<enumeration value="--12--+04:00"/>		
		<enumeration value="--01---05:00"/>
		<enumeration value="--01--Z"/>
	</restriction>
</simpleType>

<simpleType name="dtmMinMaxInclusive">
	<restriction  base="gDay">
		<minInclusive value="--01--Z"/>
		<maxInclusive value="--12--+12:00"/>		
	</restriction>
</simpleType>

<simpleType name="dtmMinMaxExclusive">
	<restriction  base="gDay">
		<minExclusive value="--01--Z"/>
		<maxExclusive value="--12--Z"/>
	</restriction>
</simpleType>

<element name="root">
	<complexType>
		<sequence>
			<element name="elEnumeration" type="sv:dtmEnumeration" 
minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
			<element name="elMinMaxInclusive" 
type="sv:dtmMinMaxInclusive" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
			<element name="elMinMaxExclusive" 
type="sv:dtmMinMaxExclusive" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>		
	
		</sequence>
	</complexType>
</element>    
</schema>  	

Instance:  D3_2_14v10.xml
=========================
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<dv:root xmlns:dv="http://www.schemaTest.org/D3_2_14v10"
	xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
	xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.schemaTest.org/D3_2_14v10
	D3_2_14v10.xsd">
	
	<elEnumeration>--12--+04:00</elEnumeration>
	<elEnumeration>--01---05:00</elEnumeration>  
	<elEnumeration>--01--Z</elEnumeration>

	<elMinMaxInclusive>--01--Z</elMinMaxInclusive>
	<elMinMaxInclusive>--12--+12:00</elMinMaxInclusive>
	<elMinMaxInclusive>--10--+05:00</elMinMaxInclusive>	

	<elMinMaxExclusive>--02--</elMinMaxExclusive>
	<elMinMaxExclusive>--11--+12:00</elMinMaxExclusive>

</dv:root>
	

The errors that are reported by the parser for the schema above are:
Datatype error: Error in day parsing
Datatype error: Illegal value --01--Z for facet minInclusive.
Datatype error: Illegal value --12--Z for facet maxExclusive.
Datatype error: Illegal value --02--+12:00 for facet minExclusive.
